thread.title: Comcast, Charter partner for mobile services back-end software

title: Comcast, Charter partner for mobile services back-end software
text:
April 20, 2018 / 3:47 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago Comcast, Charter partner for mobile services back-end software Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - Comcast Corp ( CMCSA.O ) and Charter Communications Inc ( CHTR.O ) will partner to develop back-end software to support services for their Xfinity and Spectrum mobile offerings, the companies said on Friday. The NBC and Comcast logos are displayed on 30 Rockefeller Plaza in midtown Manhattan in New York, U.S., February 27, 2018. REUTERS/Lucas Jackson 
The 50/50 partnership will help lower costs and power both companiesâ€™ mobile-related customer sales and support platforms, device logistics and billing. Reporting by Arjun Panchadar in Bengaluru
